Package gameplay

Class MovePiece

java.lang.Object
gameplay.MovePiece
public class MovePiece extends Object
The MovePiece class contains methods that will check if a move is legal and execute instructions based on that
Since:
2022-03-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Max Zhou (mj94), Dhruv Patel (dvp67)

  • Method Details

    • movePiece

      public static boolean movePiece(String turn, String original, String destination, Board board, Checkmated whiteInCheckmate, Checkmated blackInCheckmate, LastMove lastMove)
      Checks if a move is legal or not. Moves the piece if it is legal
      Parameters:
      turn - the current player's turn
      original - the original coordinates inputed by the user
      destination - the destination coordinates inputed by the user
      board - the board to be played on
      whiteInCheckmate - the status of white in checkmate
      blackInCheckmate - the status of black in checkmate
      lastMove - the information of the last move
      Returns:
      true if the move was legal, false if the move was illegal

    • fileRankToBoardIndex

      public static int[] fileRankToBoardIndex(String fileRank)
      Converts the coordinates in string format to array format (ar[0] = row, ar[1] = col)
      Parameters:
      fileRank - the coordinates inputed by the user
      Returns:
      an array with the coordinates
